description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: MTR Train service enhancement during New Year
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 港鐵新年期間加強服務

2025-12-30T12:36:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that to facilitate travel needs, train services will be enhanced with more frequent trips on several rail lines during different periods from now until 4 January. 

New Year's Eve (31 December)
Overnight service:
◦All local lines (except the Airport Express, Disneyland Resort Line and journeys to or from Lo Wu and Lok Ma Chau stations on the East Rail Line)
◦7 Light Rail routes 505, 507, 610, 614P, 615P, 751 and 706

Extended service hours:
◦East Rail Line service to/from Lo Wu (to/from Lok Ma Chau will not be extended)
◦Disneyland Resort Line
◦Bus route 506, K51 and K54A

The last Airport Express will depart from AsiaWorld-Expo on:
◦31 December: 1:30am the next day
◦1 January: 1:00am the next day

Please refer to MTRCL's website for more information. 

Crowd management measures may be implemented in stations when necessary.
2025-12-30T12:36:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，為方便大家外出，即日至1月4日期間，多條本地鐵路綫於不同時段加密班次，加強列車服務。

除夕夜（12月31日)
通宵行駛：
◦本地鐵路綫（不包括機場快綫、迪士尼綫及東鐵綫往返羅湖及落馬洲站)
◦7條輕鐵路綫505、507、610、614P、615P、751及706

延長服務時間：
◦東鐵綫往返羅湖站（往返落馬洲站不會延長服務）
◦迪士尼綫
◦3條巴士綫506、K51及K54A

機場快綫博覽館站尾班車亦會延後：
◦12月31日：延至翌日凌晨01:30開出
◦1月1日：延至翌日凌晨01:00開出

詳情請參閲港鐵網頁。

部分車站在人多時或會實施客流管理措施。

2025-12-31T12:03:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that to facilitate travel needs, train services will be enhanced with more frequent trips on several rail lines during different periods from now until 4 January. 

New Year's Eve (31 December)
•Overnight service: ◦All local lines (except the Airport Express, Disneyland Resort Line and journeys to or from Lo Wu and Lok Ma Chau stations on the East Rail Line)
◦7 Light Rail routes 505, 507, 610, 614P, 615P, 751 and 706

• Extended service hours: ◦East Rail Line service to/from Lo Wu (to/from Lok Ma Chau will not be extended)
◦Disneyland Resort Line
◦Bus route 506, K51 and K54A

The last Airport Express will depart from AsiaWorld-Expo on:
•31 December: 1:30am the next day
•1 January: 1:00am the next day

Please see MTRCL's website for more information. 

Crowd management measures may be implemented in stations when necessary. Please refer to the latest service updates.
2025-12-31T12:03:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，為方便大家外出，即日至1月4日期間，多條本地鐵路綫於不同時段加密班次，加強列車服務。

除夕夜（12月31日)
•通宵行駛：◦本地鐵路綫（不包括機場快綫、迪士尼綫及東鐵綫往返羅湖及落馬洲站)
◦7條輕鐵路綫505、507、610、614P、615P、751及706

•延長服務時間：◦東鐵綫往返羅湖站（往返落馬洲站不會延長服務）
◦迪士尼綫
◦3條巴士綫506、K51及K54A

機場快綫博覽館站尾班車亦會延後：
•12月31日：延至翌日凌晨01:30開出
•1月1日：延至翌日凌晨01:00開出

詳情請參閲港鐵網頁。

部分車站在人多時或會實施客流管理措施，請留意最新車務資訊。

2026-01-02T06:07:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that to facilitate travel needs, train services will be enhanced with more frequent trips on the East Rail Line and Island Line during different periods from 2 January until 4 January. Please refer to MTRCL's website for more information.
2026-01-02T06:07:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，為方便大家外出，1月2日至1月4日期間，東鐵綫及港島綫於不同時段加密班次，加強列車服務。 詳情請參閲港鐵網頁。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Taxi service for concert at the Kai Tak Stadium
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 啟德主場館演唱會的士服務

2026-01-01T22:43:00.CONTENT_EN: It is the peak dispersal period of concert at the Kai Tak Stadium, the passenger queue for taxi service at the Kai Tak Stadium Taxi Pick-up/Drop-off Area is relatively long and it would take some time for boarding the taxis. Spectators are advised to use the MTR to leave the Kai Tak Sports Park. Spectators are advised to take heed of the real-time information via on-site broadcast and the "Easy Leave" (easyleave. police. gov. hk) as well as the latest traffic news through the TD's website (www. td. gov. hk), the "HKeMobility" mobile application, radio and television broadcasts.
2026-01-01T22:43:00.CONTENT_CN: 現時為啟德主場館演唱會散場人流高峰時段，啟德主場館的士上落客區現時輪候人數較多，輪候時間會較長。觀眾請選擇乘搭港鐵離開啟德體育園。 　　觀眾請留意場地廣播和「離場易」（easyleave.police.gov.hk）提供的實時資訊，以及經運輸署網頁（www.td.gov.hk）、「香港出行易」流動應用程式、電台和電視台發放的最新交通消息。

2026-01-04T15:42:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2026-01-04T15:42:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。
